pages.text: 55|68|tata ache phala-mula, khejura arau dalima.
55|69|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|70|se'i jannatasamuhara majata ache caraitrararti, raupahi ramani.
55|71|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|72|camiyanaborata suraksita hai thakiba hurasakala.
55|73|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|74|Yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i.
55|75|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|76|sihamte a'uji bahiba se'i'ujiya dalicha arau dhuniya sinkhapara gadiyukta asanata.
55|77|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|78|barakatamaya tomara pratipalakara nama, yijana mahamahima arau mahanubhara.
56|1|Yetiya kiyamata sanghatita ha’ba
56|2|(tetiya) iyara sanghatanara asbikarakarai kono nathakiba.
56|3|I karaobaka adhahpatana karaiba, karaobaka samunnata karaiba
56|4|yetiya prthirai prabala prakampanerae prakampita ha’ba
56|5|arau parbatasamuha curna-bicurna hai paraiba
56|6|phalata se'ibora biksipta dhulikanata parainata ha’ba
56|7|arau tomaloke bibhakta hai paraiba tinita dalata
56|8|eteke somphalara dala; arau somphalara dalato kimana ye saubhagyabana
56|9|arau ba'omphalara dala; arau ba'omphalara dalato kimana ye durbhagiya
56|10|arau agragamisakale'i agragami
56|11|te'omloke'i sannidhyapraapta
56|12|te'omloka thakiba niyamatapurna jannatasamuhata
56|13|bahusankhyaka ha’ba purbarartisakalara majara paraa
56|14|arau kama sankhyaka ha’ba parabartisakalara majara paraa.
56|15|Sonerae nirmita asanamuhata
56|16|sihamte parasparae mukhamukhikai a'uji bahiba.
